text: Carlotta may refer to: ==People and fictional characters== *Carlotta (name), a list of people and fictional characters with the given name *Carlotta (performer) (born 1943), Australian cabaret performer and TV personality *Mary Myers (1849–1932), American professional balloonist better known as "Carlotta, the Lady Aeronaut" ==Places== *Carlotta, California, United States, an unincorporated community *Villa Carlotta, a house on Lake Como, Italy *Villa Carlotta (Los Angeles County), two houses in California ==Ships== *, a United States Navy patrol boat in service from 1917 to 1918 * French brig Carlotta (1807), captured by the British in 1810 and redesignated HMS Carlotta * , the French brig Pylades, captured by the British and renamed Carlotta after the wreck of the earlier Carlotta *TSS Carlotta (1893), British passenger vessel ==Other uses== *Tropical Storm Carlotta, several tropical cyclones in the Pacific Ocean *A fictional island in the 1982 comedy film Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid ==See also== * Carlota (disambiguation) *Carotta (disambiguation)
title: Carlotta
